subject: Technical support
description_text:
Hello, I did place an order the 13th of November (#SSN3438).

At the moment I only received the pedals, the heel-plate and the VAM Pro
(but they are missing the extra U-mounts that I purchased).

The first negative impression was on the heel-plate, it’s all scratched and
stained.
Second negative impression was on the brake pedals, the 2-way hydraulic rod
has a big scratch on it.
Also the clutch disappointed me, the sensor is misaligned to the pedal
structure, but at least it works.

Those are “not relevant” defects as long I was expecting all the pedals to
work properly, unfortunately the throttle input is not registered at all
making the set unusable.

I don’t want a refund, in complete honesty I like your product. Maybe I
just had bad luck in receiving a faulty or not well inspected one.
I would like to send back the pedals and the wheel-base and get a quality
replacement as your standard suggests.

Kind regards.

In the meantime, please check if the throttle spring is indeed causing the lack of response, or ensure the pedals are properly connected to the main controller, reconnect the USB, and use the Offset function in the software to reset the pedal signals, then retest the throttle.

I did already check if the spring was working on the load cell, but I
didn’t try to reset the offset, I tried now and is still not working. I
want to show you me testing it, where can I upload the video?

In the meanwhile, this is the photo of the spring:
